message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you. My initial offer is $110 for the product.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'd be willing to make a deal at that price.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. After considering your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I'm still a bit flexible, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'd be willing to make a deal at that price.
Considering your offer, I am willing to sell the product at $95. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value you place on it.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'd be willing to go up to $92.50. That's as high as I'm willing to go.
I understand your position, Bob. I am willing to sell the product at $93. I hope this meets your expectations.
I'm not sure if I can go any higher, but I'd be willing to meet you at $92. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
Considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product at $92.5. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value you place on it.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $90. If we can't meet at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
